articles.title: Kim Jong Un Pays Homage to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Pays Homage to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army and supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people, visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Thursday, the Day of the Shining Star, to pay profound respects to leader Kim Jong Il.
					Accompanying him were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk and Kim Chang Sop, officials of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the DPRK National Defence Commission, staff members of the KPA Supreme Command, commanding officers of KPA large-combined units, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK, and leading officials of ministries and national institutions.
					
					The chief of the guards of honor of KPA three services and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards made a salute to the portrait of smiling Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					
					Seen before the portrait was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly and the Cabinet of the DPRK.
					
					Written on the ribbons of the floral basket were letters reading "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il is immortal".
					
					Kim Jong Un, together with senior party, state and military officials, paid deep respects to Kim Jong Il in humble reverence while looking up to his portrait.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in DPRK
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Commemorated in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was significantly commemorated in the DPRK.
					Pyongyang, provinces, cities and counties, industrial establishments and co-op farms were garbed in festive attires and wrapped in an atmosphere of boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					The venue of the 16th Kimjongilia Festival and the exhibition halls of Kimjongilia in various provinces were pervaded with unbounded reverence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					The visitors to the venues of photo and fine art exhibitions stood long before the documents related to photos and fine art works showing the sacred life of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Officials and other working people and youth and students in different provinces held meetings and concerts for remembering Kim Jong Il, recollecting so many unforgettable stories about his journeys for field guidance.
					
					Remembrance concerts of school youth and children were opened in South Phyongan and Hamgyong provinces under the respective titles "Eternal Sun of Songun in the 21st Century" and "February Replete with Yearning."
					
					Art performances were given at theatres and halls in Pyongyang and localities and hymns and songs of peerless great men resounded forth at institutions at all levels, industrial establishments and co-op farms.
					
					Joint meetings of the Korean Children's Union organizations took place in different provincial capitals.
					
					Commercial and public catering networks were busy with service on the February holiday.

articles.title: Banquet Given in DPRK to Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Banquet Given in DPRK to Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A banquet was given at the People's Palace of Culture here on Thursday to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Attending it were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, persons of merit, overseas compatriot delegations and individuals and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations here, members of the military attaches corps and other foreign guests were present on invitation.
					
					Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., WPK, made a speech at the banquet.
					
					Born as the son of the guerillas in Mt. Paektu, Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career was the most brilliant one of an unequaled legendary hero, great revolutionary and peerless patriot, the speaker said, adding:
					
					He had long led to victory the Juche revolution, the Songun revolution, thus performing great exploits to be recorded as immortal in the history of humankind.
					
					Thanks to his distinguished idea and leadership the DPRK worked world-startling miracles and drastic changes in all domains of the revolution and construction and ushered in the new era of building a prosperous and powerful country, a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the 5 000-year-long history of the Korean nation. 
					
					The speaker said that all the Korean people would hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages with noble moral obligation and unshakable faith that he is always with them and go along the road of independence, Songun and socialism to the last.
					
					They should hold the dear respected Kim Jong Un, who is identical to Kim Jong Il in every aspect, in high esteem as the center of unity and leadership and devotedly safeguard him and establish the steadfast monolithic system of his leadership and the revolutionary trait of devotedly implementing his orders, he stressed.

articles.title: KPA Three Services Meet at Kumsusan Memorial Palace
articles.content:
KPA Three Services Meet at Kumsusan Memorial Palace
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the three services of the Korean People's Army met at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace, the sacred temple of Juche, on Feb. 16 to make public a joint decision on renaming the palace the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, pay respects to Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and Generalissimo Kim Jong Il and pledge loyalty to KPA Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un. 
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un took part in the meeting.
					
					Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Jong Gak, senior party, state and army officials, commanders of the KPA services and arms, officials of the party, armed forces, power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and arts, public health and media, persons of distinguished services and labor innovators also attended.
					
					Present there on invitation were overseas Koreans including the delegation of the Koreans in Japan for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international organizations and members of military attaches corps here.
					
					They observed a moment's silence for Kim Jong Il.
					
					A joint decision of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK National Defence Commission, the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet was made public to rename the Kumsusan Memorial Palace the "Kumsusan Palace of the Sun". 
					
					A ceremony of the service persons of the three services of the KPA followed. 
					
					All the participants paid highest respects to the portrait of smiling Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and the portrait of smiling Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the founder and builder of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK.
					
					A 21 gun-salute boomed amid the playing of "Song of General Kim Il Sung" and "Song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					Chief of KPA General Staff Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, made an address. 
					
					He, reflecting the iron faith and will of the KPA, the army of the President and Kim Jong Il and the army of the Supreme Commander, pledged to share the destiny with the party forever even though the earth might break down, the sky fall and the land collapse.
					
					Then the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il entered the plaza, escorted by columns of colors.
					
					Columns of the units of the three services of the KPA marched by, carrying flags of the Supreme Commander, the WPK and the military to the tune of music of a brass band.
					
					Kim Jong Un held his hand to salute them.
					
					The columns of multiple launch rocket system, missiles and armored cars passed through the plaza.
					
					At the end of the march, he waved back to the enthusiastic, cheering masses.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Russian President
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un today received a congratulatory message from Russian President D. Medvedev on the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The message said:
					
					I send congratulations to you on the 70th birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, the national holiday of the DPRK.
					
					Russia always remembers and highly estimates the efforts made by HE Kim Jong Il for the development of the good-neighborly relations between the two countries.
					
					I am convinced that the Russia-DPRK cooperation based on the tradition of long-standing friendship and mutual respect will in the future, too, develop in the interests of the two peoples and contribute to ensuring peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the whole Asian region.
					
					I wish you success in your state activities and the Korean people happiness, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Chinese and Russians Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese and Russians Pay Tribute to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK and staff members of his embassy laid a floral basket before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il in Kim Il Sung Square on Thursday, the Day of the Shining Star.
					They laid a floral basket before the portrait with boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il who made immortal contributions to the development of the DPRK-China friendship and the accomplishment of human cause of independence and paid tribute to him.
					
					Meanwhile, staff members of the Chinese and Russian consulates general in Chongjin and Chinese in the DPRK laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in the cities of Chongjin and Kanggye on the same day.

articles.title: Delegations of Int'l Organization and Japan Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegations of Int'l Organization and Japan Pay Homage to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party and the delegation of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio on Thursday on the occasion of birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					The guests laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them. 
					
					Lyne Sinyodyium, director of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea, also visited the statues of to pay tribute on the same day.

articles.title: Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreigners Pay Homage to Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A floral basket in the joint name of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association was sent to the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il on his birth anniversary, the Day of the Shining Star. 
					Meanwhile, the Russian Youth Association for the Study of the Juche Idea sent a floral basket to his portrait.
					
					The floral baskets were laid before the portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il in Kim Il Sung Square on Thursday.

articles.title: Japanese Guests Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festiva
articles.content:
Japanese Guests Visit Venue of Kimjongilia Festival
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Japanese guests, staying in the DPRK to commemorate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, visited the venue of the 16th Kimjongilia Festival on Thursday.
					They are Kenichi Ogami, secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party and the delegation of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works led by Masaji Ie, advisor of its National Liaison Council. 
					
					The visitors looked round with deep emotion the immortal flowers which came to full bloom with sincerity of the Korean people and the world progressives deeply revering Kim Jong Il. 
					
					At the end of the visit they made entries in the visitor's book. 
					
					Kenichi Ogami wrote: 
					
					We deeply felt once again the greatness of General Secretary Kim Jong Il while viewing the venue decorated with beautiful Kimjongilias in full bloom. 
					
					He provided sure guarantee for the final victory of Juche revolution. 
					
					We will go along the road of Juche forever together with the dear respected HE Kim Jong Un who is carrying forward the cause of the great President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing gave a reception on Feb. 13 on the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Present there on invitation were Li Changchun, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, Wang Jiarui, head of the International Liaison Department of the CPC Central Committee, Zhang Yannong, president of the People's Daily of China, and others and officials concerned.
					
					DPRK Ambassador to China Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of his embassy were present there.
					
					Ji Jae Ryong in his speech at the reception said Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to boosting the traditional DPRK-China relations of friendship. He is always alive as the sun in the hearts of the Korean and Chinese peoples and progressive mankind, Ji noted.
					
					Ji expressed the will to make every possible effort to develop the DPRK-China friendly relations onto a higher stage.
					
					Li Changchun said that the contributions made by Kim Jong Il to promoting the traditional Sino-DPRK relations of friendship and cooperation will always be remembered by the Chinese people.
					
					He expressed the will to boost the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly relations in the spirit of inheriting the tradition, facing up to the future, building good-neighborly friendship and strengthening cooperation in the future, too. 
					
					Meanwhile, a book and photo exhibition was held at the DPRK consulate-general in Shenyang on Feb. 10.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Chinese Delegation
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from the visiting delegation of the China Association for International Friendly Contact led by Li Chun, head of office of the association, on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					Li Chun conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Greeting to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian, Mexican Party Leaders
articles.content:
Greeting to Kim Jong Un from Indonesian, Mexican Party Leaders
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received messages of greeting from Indonesian and Mexican party leaders on Feb. 2 and 8 on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					They are Chairman Andreas Hugo Pareira and Secretary General Tjahjo Kumolo of the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle and Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico.
					
					The messages said that Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits for the victory of the Korean and the world revolution would shine forever. 
					
					They hoped that under the leadership of Kim Jong Un the Korean people would achieve bigger successes in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Meeting of Executive Committee of WIDF
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Participants in Meeting of Executive Committee of WIDF
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter on Feb. 7 from the participants in the meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation in Lisbon on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The letter praised Kim Jong Il as a distinguished thinker and theoretician, rare political elder, peerless Songun brilliant commander and the benevolent father of the people.
					
					It is thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK has firmly defended socialism from the vicious moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle it and demonstrated its might as a dignified political, ideological and military power based on single-minded unity and a nuclear weapons state, the letter said.
					
					The noble life and brilliant feats of Kim Jong Il who advanced the revolutionary cause of Juche and global independence to victory will always be remembered by mankind, it stressed.
					
					The revolutionary life of Kim Jong Il will always remain shining thanks to Kim Jong Un who is identical to him in the idea, leadership and personality.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from C.C., AINDF
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a letter from the C.C., Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Jong Il's revolutionary life of nearly 70 years was the most brilliant life of the peerless patriot, a legendary great man who adorned the protracted course of the Juche revolution, the Songun revolution with victory and glory, the letter said, adding:
					
					He formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme for great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, advanced by President Kim Il Sung, as the three charters for national reunification and provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration with his bold decision based on patriotism, thus instilling confidence in the victory of national reunification and courage into all Koreans.
					
					He enjoyed absolute respect and reverence from all people as the guardian of justice and elder statesman of the world by greatly encouraging the progressive mankind desirous of independence, sovereignty and socialism and dealing a mercilessly telling blow at the imperialists' strategy for world supremacy.
					
					His lifelong cause is now being creditably carried forward under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, a great man produced by the nation, the letter noted, saying:
					
					Thanks to you, leader Kim Jong Il will be always alive as the sun of Songun and the revolutionary cause of Juche and the great cause of building a reunified powerful nation led by him are sure to emerge victorious.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Thursday received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The letter said:
					
					Kim Jong Il was the most outstanding statesman who opened a new phase of the revolution with his brilliant wisdom, encyclopedic ideas and theories, rare leadership art and noble virtue for decades and performed immortal feats on behalf of the country and the nation, the era and history since he embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years.
					
					Kim Jong Il was the lodestar of the country's reunification as he provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, the reunification programmes common to the nation in the new century, thus paving a wide avenue for reunification, and an outstanding political elder who steered the international political trend in the 21st century, defending world peace and leading the human cause of independence to victory.
					
					Kim Jong Il was the great leader of the Juche-oriented Koreans movement in Japan and an immensely tender-hearted teacher of the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.
					
					Noting that it is the greatest fortune for the country, the nation and Chongryon to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem, the letter expressed the will to strengthen Chongryon as a powerful overseas compatriots organization loyal to him.
					
					Chongryon will commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung as the greatest holiday of the Korean nation and a jubilee common to humankind, and thus demonstrate internally and externally the patriotic loyalty of the Chongryon officials and Koreans in Japan carrying forward the bloodline of Mangyongdae and the tradition of Paektu without an inch of deflection, the letter concluded.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Family

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Chinese Family
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who is a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, sent a floral basket to the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Russian Family

Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Russian Family
