articles.title: Greeting to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greeting to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on February 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					The president in the message said that he expressed satisfaction at the good relations and cooperation between the two countries, greeting the great day.  He also reaffirmed his resolve to closely cooperate with Kim Jong Un for further developing those excellent relations in the interests of the two countries. 
					
					The message extended warmest congratulations and wishes to him.

articles.title: Greeting to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Greeting to Kim Jong Un from President of Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Thein Sein, president of Myanmar, on Feb. 10 on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The message said:
					
					I, on behalf of the people of the Republic of the Union of Myanmar and on my own, send heartfelt wishes to Your Excellency and, through you, to the people of the DPRK on the auspicious birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					
					Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you good health and successes in your work for steady progress and prosperity of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Korean Family in Russia
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Il from Korean Family in Russia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The family of Jong Il Sim, a Korean resident in Russia, sent a floral basket to the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il on the Day of the Shining Star.
					The basket was laid before the portrait at Kim Il Sung Square on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Official of EEMP
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Official of EEMP
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Kosima Weber Liu, executive director of the Environmental Education Media Project, on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The basket was conveyed to an official concerned on Thursday.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Int'l Figure Skating Festival Participants
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Int'l Figure Skating Festival Participants
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Thursday received a letter from Javier Martin Lopez on behalf of the participants of Skyeyes International in the 21st Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival. 
					The letter said it is great honor and pleasure for them to attend the festival for commemorating the Day of the Shining Star. 
					
					It is a privilege for us to take part in the commemorations of the Day of the Shining Star, it noted, stressing: 
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il's exploits for prosperity and happiness of the Korean people will remain forever and he will be always with us. 
					
					In the letter the festival participants expressed their wishes to show their warmest reverence by ensuring on the highest level their performances in the festival. 
					
					They hoped that the Korean people would achieve big successes in building a thriving nation.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Leaves for Vietnam
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) --A delegation of the DPRK-Vietnam Friendship Association left here for Vietnam on Thursday to attend commemorations of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il to be held in this country.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given by Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given by Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A music and dance performance was given by students of Joson University in Tokyo on Feb. 15 to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Put on the stage which began with chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il", revolutionary paean, were chorus "Where Are You, Dear General?", masterpiece, female vocal solo "Cantata to General Kim Jong Il", female duet "Our Father", jangsaenap solo "Arirang of Prosperity", dance "Seed-We Will Make Flower Garden of National Education" and other numbers.
					
					The performers praised the feats of Kim Jong Il who protected and glorified the destiny of the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan and led the movement of Koreans in Japan to the road of victory and glory.
					
					They sang of the great pride and honor of having the dear respected Kim Jong Un in the van of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the movement of Koreans in Japan.
					
					Among the audience were Nam Sung U and Ko Tok U, vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Pae Jin Gu, vice-chairman and concurrently director general of the General Affairs Department of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, and other officials and compatriots. 
					
					All the performers and audiences are full of a firm resolution to provide a springboard for a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to People of Manpho City
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Autographs to People of Manpho City
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un Tuesday sent autographs to the people of Manpho City, Jagang Province, in reply to a letter they sent after moving to new houses.
					In the autographs he said he was pleased to hear that Manpho citizens were very glad to move to new houses, a result of leader Kim Jong Il's loving care. 
					
					He said the officials of the city should always look after people's life and settle their problems in time and put the interests of people above all so that the popular policies of the Workers' Party of Korea can be realized along with the august name of Kim Jong Il.
					
					He said he could not accept rice Manpho citizens were willing to send to the builders of the statue of Kim Jong Il. He said he would convey the people's fidelity to leader Kim Jong Il, reminding him of the blood ties remaining resilient between the leader and the people. 
					
					He let the rice be sent to people and children of the city. 
					
					Heartened by the letter, he renewed the will to carry on the revolution with redoubled efforts, he said. 
					
					245 families in Manpho City moved to new modern houses on the shore of the River Amnok on the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.  On February 12 they forwarded a letter to Kim Jong Un pledging to devote themselves to accomplishing the cause of Juche revolution and Songun under his leadership.

articles.title: Endless Stream of People Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Endless Stream of People Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the People's Army, working people of all social strata and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing at the Mansudae Art Studio and the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il across the country and paid in the humblest reverence tribute to them on the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					The Mansudae Art Studio was visited by an endless crowd of officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions and service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and arts, public health and media institutions, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, former unconverted long-term prisoners who are pro-reunification patriotic fighters, working people and school youth and children in Pyongyang with unbounded reverence for the leader.
					
					Seen standing before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il was a floral basket sent by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Laid before the statues were floral baskets and flowers in the name of the party, armed forces, power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, organs at all levels and industrial establishments, schools and others.
					
					The visitors paid tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, looking up to their statues.
					
					The places in Pyongyang including Kim Il Sung Square, plazas of the April 25 House of Culture and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium where portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il were displayed were pervaded with boundless reverence for him. 
					
					Floral baskets and flowers in the name of different units were laid before the above-said portraits.
					
					Service personnel of the KPA, people from all walks of life and school youth and children paid tribute to the portraits.
					
					The delegations of the overseas compatriots and compatriots, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and foreigners paid tribute to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio and portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					An endless stream of people visited the portraits of smiling Kim Jong Il in provincial capitals including Wonsan, Sinuiju and Sariwon in humblest reverence for him.

articles.title: Grand Performance Given in DPRK on Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Grand Performance Given in DPRK on Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A grand performance for commemoration of leader Kim Jong Il's birthday "We Will Be Loyal Down through Generations" was given at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday.
					Present to view the performance was Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state and army of the DPRK.
					
					It was also enjoyed by Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, officials of party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and press organs and men and officers of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					Present to watch it on invitation were overseas compatriot delegations and individuals including a delegation of Koreans in Japan to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front, representatives of embassies of different countries and international organizations and members of the military attaches corps here.
					
					The performance began with orchestral music and chorus "We Will Be Loyal down through Generations".
					
					Its numbers included mixed duet and chorus "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il", an all-people hymn sung by the Korean army and people in every period of the revolution. Among them are also choruses "Old Home Covered with Snow" and "The General Is the Son of the Guerrillas", piano duet and chorus "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee", female solo and chorus "Snowflakes Falling in the Night Sky", male solo and male chorus "Song of Comradeship", male chorus "The General Uses the Art of Compressing Space" and male solo and mixed chorus "We Will Never Forget".
					
					The performers sang of the brilliant life of the peerless patriot, who was born as the shining star over Mt. Paektu amid the blessing of all people and laid a solid foundation for eternal prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation, adorning the protracted course of the Juche revolution with proud victory and glory.

articles.title: People in DPRK Strongly Yearn for Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
People in DPRK Strongly Yearn for Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- In the evening of the Day of the Shining Star, the first birthday of leader Kim Jong Il after his demise, KCNA reporter went to Kim Il Sung Square and other places in Pyongyang where huge portraits of a smiling Kim Jong Il are set up again.
					People lined up at those places to pay respects to the late leader's portraits even late at night.
					
					There were servicepersons who pledged to uphold the Songun (military-first) politics started by Kim Jong Il with the arms in the art performances celebrating the day.
					
					There were also industrial and agricultural workers who spent the day at their worksites renewing their pledge to implement behests of Kim Jong Il. Schoolchildren who received gifts this year, too, were also among the visitors.
					
					They laid floral baskets, bouquets and flowers and bowed before the portraits of a smiling Kim Jong Il wishing for his immortality.
					
					Kim Pyong Hup, a 78-year old war veteran living in Ryongbuk-dong, Taesong District, was interviewed by the KCNA. Asked why he came at night, not during the day, he said:
					
					"Every year on this day, my family used to spend the night wishing Kim Jong Il good health. He is not now with us. We miss him very much. He is in the hearts of the Korean people."
					
					They pledged to remain loyal to him and implement his behests with moral obligation.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Sing Praises of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Sing Praises of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Factories and institutions in Pyongyang gave art performances on the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birthday of the late leader Kim Jong Il.
					They eulogized the undying feats Kim Jong Il made in giving field guidance for the wellbeing of the people all his life.
					
					Numbers included "Intense yearning", "We miss Kim Jong Il" and "Whenever we think of the path of Songun".
					
					Narration and song "Thank you father Kim Jong Il" by workers of the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill dealt with the tireless efforts Kim Jong Il made to improve the people's livelihood.
					
					Narrative poem "Song of Wishes" by the Pyongyang City Foodstuff and Necessities Management Bureau were highly appreciated by the audience.      
					
					The art piece featured Kim Jong Il's devoted efforts for the nation's development.
					
					The songs by the Central Information and Communication Centre and the Rungnado Guidance Bureau portrayed their feelings of yearning for Kim Jong Il. 
					
					The performances represented their unshakable faith and will to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche, true to the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Moviemen Mark Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Moviemen Mark Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A performance of film workers "Always on One Road" was given at the Pyongyang International Cinema House here on Thursday to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star.
					The performers staged colorful numbers telling about the immortal exploits of leader Kim Jong Il performed by bringing the golden age of the Juche-based cinematic art as well as the glorious course covered by it.
					
					Story-telling and song "The Path to Awakening" and female solo "My Star" brought home to the audience the greatness of Kim Jong Il who created a precious tradition of Juche-based revolutionary cinematics.
					
					Narrative poem "Standing in the Van of Drive to Bring Drastic Improvement in the Cinematic Art" and tale in drama "Love and Trust" showed their deep yearning for the benevolent father, the great teacher who brought into full bloom the creators and artistes' talents.
					
					Also put on stage were "I'll Be the Flower to Herald the Spring", a song which Kim Jong Il always kept in his mind during his long journey of Songun leadership and film music pieces much loved and remembered by him.
					
					What specially touched the audience was a play based on real-story and song telling that feature film "Wishes" was the last movie he watched in his lifetime.

articles.title: Jangjasan Children's Camp Starts Its Operation
articles.content:
Jangjasan Children's Camp Starts Its Operation
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The first-term camping for this year started at the Jangjasan Children's Camp in the DPRK on Thursday, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Taking part in the camping are members of the Children's Union from the capital city of Pyongyang, North and South Phyongan and Jagang provinces and other parts of the country.
					
					A meeting "evening of campers missing Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, their respected father" took place at the camp on the same day.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Life for Realizing Kim Il Sung's Desire
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Life for Realizing Kim Il Sung's Desire
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung devoted his all to building a thriving socialist nation. It was his desire to build a country where all the people lead a happy life.
					Leader Kim Jong Il, regarding the President's will as his lifelong wish, made field guidance for the people's happiness till the last moments of his life.
					
					When he visited the Pyongyang Flour-processing Factory in January Juche 99 (2010), he said many foodstuff production bases were built throughout the country under the leadership of the President.
					
					The officials should realize his idea without fail by pushing forward the modernization of the industrial establishments, he added.
					
					Touring technologically updated chicken farms and pig farms, he used to say President Kim Il Sung might have been pleased if he had seen them.  Seeing the Taehung Youth Hero Mine and the Songjin Steel Complex which started production with fuel and raw materials available in the country, he also thought of the President.
					
					He also looked back on the President, touring the breakwater of the reclaimed Taegyedo tideland and new mountain-climbing routes of Mt. Myohyang.
					
					He, regarding it as his noble mission to put into practice the desire of the President, made field guidance all his life. 
					
					Under his energetic leadership the industrial establishments have constantly been updated, the production of vinalon and fertilizer has been normalized with locally available raw materials, and modern fruit farms appeared in the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Lodestar for Korea's Reunification
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Lodestar for Korea's Reunification
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are recollecting the great feats leader Kim Jong Il performed in leading the national reunification on the Day of the Shining Star (his birthday). 
					The leader was not only the father of the Korean nation but also the lodestar for its reunification as he ushered in the era of "By our nation itself", the era of independence in the nation's history of division and confrontation that lasted more than half a century.  "By our nation itself" is the core spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					He paid much effort to building a thriving reunified nation, the lifelong cause of President Kim Il Sung and long-cherished desire of the Korean nation. 
					
					Based on the transparent idea of national independence, he provided the great guidelines for the country's reunification. 
					
					He made public the historic work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification" in August Juche 86 (1997). In the work he formulated the Three Charters for National Reunification, reflection of the President's Juche-based idea and line of national reunification, and declared it.  
					
					The leader systematized in an integral way the Three Principles of National Reunification, the 10-point Programme of the Great Unity of the Whole Nation for the Reunification of the Country and the Proposal for Founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President as the Three Charters for National Reunification. This is the great ideological and theoretical feat he performed for national reunification. 
					
					He set forth the Five-point Policy for the Great National Unity based on the President's idea of the great unity of the nation. This great programme helps settle the reunification issue by the efforts of the Korean nation, driving force of the reunification.  
					
					He also laid down objectives for implementing the three charters and five-point policy and a new reunification slogan concerning their implementation to step up the reunification movement. 
					
					His wise leadership culminated in the two north-south Pyongyang summits and the adoption of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration. These declarations ushered in a new era of the independent reunification of the Korean nation. 
					
					The historic June 15 era of reunification owes its success to the leader's patriotic activities and Songun (military-first) politics. 
					
					No forces on the earth can weaken the efforts of all the Koreans for reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Humanity Admired by World People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Humanity Admired by World People
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- "I saw personality and disposition of a sage, a sun-like man in leader Kim Jong Il. He can be likened to the sun." Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group and chairman of the Development Bank of the Mediterranean, said this.  
					World political elder Kim Jong Il was a man possessed of the noblest human love.  
					
					He embraced and took care of all those who loved justice and truth and desired independence and progress irrespective of differing nationality, language, complexion, political view and religious belief. 
					
					One of them was Pierre Boudot, a famous French professor. He, feeling that he was much indebted to Kim Jong Il, used to tell his colleagues that Kim Jong Il was a great man who care for his comrades, whom he once put trust in, and also their children.  
					
					The wife of Moustafa, a diplomat of the Palestine Liberation Organization operational in Pyongyang, gave a birth to her first baby girl after a decade of marital life at the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital under the deep care of the leader.
					
					Though busy with the state affairs, Kim Jong Il read a letter of thanks the couple presented to him and named their daughter "Jindallae" (azalea), and sent gifts to them.
					
					His warm love went to a number of foreign families including those of a former Soviet Union veteran, a Cuban child called "Saebyol", Checa of Peru and Govind of India. 
					
					When he dropped in at Khasan during his Russia visit, the leader first learned in detail about the residents' traffic problem caused by the strong wind. This aroused admiration among the Russians and world media. 
					
					He was a man who impressed all the people and the world with his benevolent politics.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Strengthening WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Strengthening WPK
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- On the Day of the Shining Star, the Korean people look back on the undying feats leader Kim Jong Il performed by leading the Workers' Party of Korea along the path of victory for nearly half a century.
					Since he began his work at the WPK Central Committee he had carried on active ideological activities to indicate a unique idea that a working-class party should become a party of the leader. 
					
					He formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung as an integrated Juche system of idea, theory and method and worked hard to model the whole party on the Juche idea. This served as a turning point in making the WPK that of the President.
					
					Under his energetic guidance, the cause of modeling the whole party on one idea was stepped up, resulting in the establishment of the party's monolithic ideological system. 
					
					His unique Songun (military-first) politics has brought about a fresh turn in strengthening the WPK.
					
					In line with the requirements of the Songun era, he made efforts to enhance the role of party cells, improve the party work and effect a turn in the work method and style of party officials, thus developing the WPK into the guide of the Songun politics.
					
					Thanks to the WPK's Songun politics and leadership, the DPRK has developed to be a political and ideological power and a military power equipped with up-to-date offensive and defensive means and nukes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il, Outstanding Thinker and Theoretician
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il, Outstanding Thinker and Theoretician
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The greatness of a leader is precisely that of his idea.
					Great man Kim Jong Il indicated the way for the nation in shaping its destiny and the way ahead of human cause of independence with his unique and extraordinary ideas and theories. He also performed great exploits in the human history of thinking.
					
					He glorified the Juche idea, the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, as the guiding idea of the era of independence.
					
					In order to prove the absolute truth of the President's revolutionary idea, he analyzed the 100-year history of thinking of the working class. 
					
					He formulated the President's idea as an integrated Juche system of idea, theory and method and set forth the programme on modeling the whole society on the Juche idea in the 1970s.
					
					He authored famous work "On the Juche Idea", the library of the Juche idea, in March Juche 71 (1982).
					
					He extensively wrote about the Juche idea typically "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea", "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy", thereby enriching the revolutionary idea of the President and the socialist theory of Juche.
					
					When socialism collapsed in some countries late last century, he made public works "On Some Problems of the Ideological Foundation of Socialism", "The Historical Lesson in Building Socialism and the General Line of Our Party" and "Socialism Is a Science", expounding problems in defending and developing Korean-style socialism.
					
					He formulated the idea and line of the President on giving priority to the arms and military affairs as the Songun (military-first) idea and systemized them as the guidelines of the times.
					
					He laid down the Songun revolutionary principle that the army precisely means the Party, state and people, guided by the philosophy that the revolution starts, advances and is completed by dint of the arms.
					
					The principle of the Songun revolution and unique theory of Songun politics serve as the guidelines of the Workers' Party of Korea and the revolution and a treasured sword in realizing the popular masses' cause of independence in the present times.
					
					His works gave clear answers to all problems encompassing politics, military affairs, economy and culture as well as national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remains Forever in Hearts of Korean People
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remains in Hearts of Korean People Forever
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- On the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the Korean people are missing leader Kim Jong Il, father of the nation and lodestar for national reunification.
					With ardent love for the country and the nation, he showed deep loving care for the Koreans all his life.
					
					When a devastating flood hit south Korea in August Juche 73 (1984), he took measures to send relief materials to the afflicted people, the first of its kind in the history of national division, saying genuine patriotism lies in caring for fellow countrymen.
					
					Even after the death of President Kim Il Sung, educational aid funds and stipends went to the Japan-resident Koreans every year. And large amounts of relief funds were sent to the quake-stricken Koreans on several occasions.
					
					It was the faith of Kim Jong Il, an incarnation of patriotism, that one should hold hands with patriotic-minded people for the sake of national reunification, irrespective of differing ideology.
					
					Among them were Choe Hong Hui, former president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation and Jong Ju Yong, a south Korean businessman.
					
					He saw to it that Taekwon-Do Hall, Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium and Yun I Sang Concert Hall were built in Pyongyang.
					
					With the publication of the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration, he glorified the June 15 era of reunification. With the advancement of the principle of "By our nation itself", he paved the way for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification and shaping the nation's destiny. These feats will remain long in the history of the nation.

articles.title: Songun Politics, Guarantee for Prosperity of DPRK
articles.content:
Songun Politics, Guarantee for Prosperity of DPRK
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The tradition of the Songun (military-first) politics has been steadily carried forward in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					The Songun politics leader Kim Jong Il pursued throughout his revolutionary leadership serves as an invincible treasured sword for defending the sovereignty of the Korean nation.
					
					Thanks to the politics, the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula have been guaranteed.
					
					After the Cold War there were many wars in the world. But war did not break out on the Korean Peninsula, one of the world's hotspots. It was attributable to the Songun politics that deterred the U.S. war moves.
					
					The Songun politics has contained the imperialists' moves to start a war on the peninsula.
					
					The U.S. which tops the world's list of military spending seeks to dominate the world with nukes and dollars. It worked out military doctrine and strategy counting on the nuclear weapons. It is threatening those countries standing for independence against the U.S. while rallying south Korea, Japan and other allies.
					
					It has rounded off preparations for nuclear war against the DPRK and is watching for a chance for a preemptive nuclear attack on it.
					
					When the U.S. interfered in internal affairs of various countries, with wars against Iraq and Afghanistan in mind, the international community raised the voice against them.
					
					But neither international voice nor the UN Charter could hold off the U.S. attempt for invasion. 
					
					The people in the DPRK have felt through their life experience that the Songun politics is the best political mode that defends the destiny of the country and guarantees its prosperity.
					
					With the development of a powerful nuclear deterrence, the Songun politics made a breach in the U.S. nuclear umbrella when it was bluffing that "the DPRK is a target next to Iraq".
					
					Any U.S. sanctions and oppression could not work on the DPRK, thanks to the transparent working-class stand of the Songun politics against imperialism.
					
					The single-minded unity of the DPRK has grown strong under the Songun leadership of the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu. The DPRK is winning one victory after another with this might.
					
					The DPRK's Songun politics is to defend its valuable system and the people's idea, not to threaten others.
					
					The DPRK is bolstering its defence capabilities strong enough to beat aggressors at a stroke. Nobody can take issue with the DPRK as it is an exercise of inviolable right to self-defence.
					
					The deterrence of the DPRK serves as a treasured sword for preventing the nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army possessed of invincible idea and theory, superb strategy and matchless pluck and grit, is now leading the Songun revolution.
					
					The arms of Songun guarantee the security of the DPRK and its people and the victory of the socialist construction.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Will Remain Long in History
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Will Remain Long in History
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are commemorating the Day of the Shining Star in 2012, a starting year of another 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's Korea. 
					February 16, Kim Jong Il's birthday, is the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation. The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea announced on January 12 that February 16 shall be instituted as the Day of the Shining Star. 
					
					On this day the Korean people look back upon the great life of Kim Jong Il who wisely led the party, army and people of the DPRK, performing great feats for the country, the people, the times and history.
					
					People around the world are also holding colorful events to commemorate the day with ardent yearning for him who made great feats for human independence.
					
					They praise him, saying his birthday is significant not only for Korean people but other progressives of the world.
					
					President Kim Il Sung wrote a hymn praising Kim Jong Il on February 16, Juche 81 (1992).
					
					The Day of the Shining Star will go down forever in human history along with his august name and great feats.

articles.title: Illustrious Commander of Mt. Paektu and Frost Flowers
articles.content:
Illustrious Commander of Mt. Paektu and Frost Flowers
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The shore of Sobaek Stream is spectacular with frost flowers on the Day of the Shining Star (Feb. 16), the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. The stream meanders around Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp.
					On Feb. 16, Juche 31 (1942) when Kim Jong Il was born, frost flowers were all over the area. They seemed to celebrate the historical day when a shining star rose over Mt. Paektu.
					
					A newspaper of Pakistan said February is a month when the spring starts in the DPRK, adding:
					
					People in the DPRK call February a season of frost flowers. Looking at frost flowers, they feel happy and warm. Kim Jong Il was born in February carrying the warmth of the flowers with him. 
					
					Seeing a picture of frost flowers in the area of Lake Samji one day, Kim Jong Il recollected the frostwork in the area of Phothae and that in Mt. Paektu.
					
					He always loved people and devoted his all to them, keeping the frost flowers in his mind.
					
					He met all the challenges of history and brought eternal spring of happiness and prosperity to the Korean people.
					
					The frost flowers in February will always remain in the minds of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Sunrise on Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Sunrise on Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- There was a majestic sunrise on Mt. Paektu this morning, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					The Group for Comprehensive Exploration of Lake Chon on Mt. Paektu viewed it with great excitement.
					
					According to the survey of the group, it was hard to see even an inch ahead because of dense fog as it has been snowing for several consecutive days in the area of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					Marvelously, the thick clouds vanished from Feb. 15, bringing a fine weather.
					
					As it dawned on Feb. 16 the area of Mt. Paektu including the snow-capped Janggun and Hyangdo Peaks were shining with morning glow. 
					
					The temperature on Janggun and Hyangdo Peaks registered 29.6 to 28. 6 degrees below zero, slightly higher than that last year and there was rare southeastern wind 12 to 16 meters per second unlike northwestern wind which mainly hit the area.
					
					The temperature on Jong Il Peak was relatively warm; it registered 22.9 to 22.6 degrees below zero and there was northeastern wind at the speed of 5 ~ 7 meters per second.
					
					The sun rose at 7:21, shedding bright rays all over mountain ranges and vast forests in the area of the mountain.
					
					It was fantastic scenery as the morning glow was unusually majestic and bright as if it were upholding the sun.
					
					The panoramic view of Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan secret camp looked more beautiful.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place in Tokyo Wednesday to commemorate the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					Present at the meeting were Nam Sung U and Ko Tok U, vice-chairmen of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Koreans in Japan (Chongryon), Pae Jin Gu, its vice-chairman and secretary general, Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, and other Chongryon officials and compatriots and teachers and students of Joson University. 
					
					All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Nam Sung U in his report praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent thinker and theoretician, a rare political elder and unrivalled Songun brilliant commander, peerless patriot and benevolent father of the people unprecedented in history. 
					
					Kim Jong Il's nearly 70 year-long life was an immensely noble one as he performed undying exploits on behalf of the era and mankind, undergoing all sorts of sufferings as a man and leader, Nam Sung U said, and went on:
					
					Kim Jong Il was the outstanding leader of Chongryon and benevolent father and teacher who gave happiness to the Koreans in Japan and carved out a rosy future for their younger generation. 
					
					The patriotic cause of Chongryon is sure to triumph as the dear respected Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Jong Il clearly indicates the road to be followed by Chongryon and there is the prospering homeland.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un from the Chongryon Central Standing Committee was adopted at the meeting. 
					
					Meanwhile, a Chongryon central photo exhibition commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il took place in Tokyo on the same day.

articles.title: Academic Symposium Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Academic Symposium Held in Tokyo
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An academic symposium of Korean social scientists in Japan took place in Tokyo on Tuesday in commemoration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					Its participants heard speeches made on the subjects "On the epoch-making exploits performed by the great leader General Kim Jong Il in carrying forward the revolutionary cause of the leader", "On the precious exploits performed by the great leader General Kim Jong Il in building an economic power" and "On the exploits performed by the great leader General Kim Jong Il in the work of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and the movement of the Koreans in Japan".
					
					The speakers recalled that he set forth a grandiose goal of building a thriving nation, the lifelong desire of President Kim Il Sung, and aroused the whole party and army and all the people, bringing about dramatic changes unprecedented in the history of the nation spanning 5 000 years. 
					
					They lauded Kim Jong Il for leading Chongryon along the road of victory with his outstanding wisdom and tested leadership, projecting it as a model of the world overseas compatriots' movement. 
					
					They stressed the shining leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il, tender-hearted teacher of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, serve as an immortal treasure for the Juche-oriented movement of the Koreans in Japan.
					
					They called for laying a springboard for ushering in a new heyday this year under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un without fail and making a report of loyalty to Kim Jong Il.
					
					Present at the symposium were Ko Tok U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the association and its other leading members, senior officials of central organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, teachers of Joson University and Korean senior schools in Japan and officials of Chongryon in Kanto area.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Issues Article on Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Issues Article on Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, issued an article on Thursday on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. The title of the article is "In memory of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, a close friend of the Chinese people".
					The article said:
					
					February 16 this year made people miss General Secretary Kim Jong Il very much after his demise.
					
					I was fortunate to be involved in receiving Kim Jong Il several times when he was visiting China. 
					
					In particular, I, as ambassador to the DPRK, had the honor of being received by the General Secretary on many occasions and in this course I felt his deep care for the Sino-DPRK friendship and sincerity toward China.
					
					Like the Korean people greeting the Day of the Shining Star, my yearning for him is growing stronger and his tender-hearted image would come to my mind.
					
					Kim Jong Il was the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people.
					
					The whole land of China is associated with footprints of Kim Jong Il, the article said, adding:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il frequently recollected President Kim Il Sung forged genuine feelings with revolutionaries of the elder generation of China including Chairman Mao Zedong, Premier Zhou Enlai and Comrade Deng Xiaoping and provided the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					In the new century he, together with Chinese leaders, glorified the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					It is the common understanding of the two parties and countries and the desire common to the two peoples to consolidate and develop the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China eight times in the new century.
					
					He visited China four times between 2010 and 2011 and had cordial meetings with the party and state leaders of China, sharing deep understanding. 
					
					He reached a series of major common understandings of the relations between the two countries and international and regional issues, giving strong impetus to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations. 
					
					He opened a bright prospect for the Sino-DPRK friendship and made a great contribution to peace and stability in the region.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Comrade Kim Jong Un received party and government and military delegations of China during their visits to the DPRK and hosted banquets in their honor. 
					
					Kim Jong Il attached great importance to the inheritance and development of the traditional friendship between the two parties and countries.
					
					He always paid deep attention to educating the younger generation so that the baton of the DPRK-China friendship was successfully carried forward.
					
					Thanks to his initiative the Cemetery of Fallen Fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers in Hoechang County was rebuilt to eternally hand it down to the generations of the two countries to come.
					
					The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il made sure that overall exchange and cooperation were briskly conducted in different fields including economy, culture, arts and education between the two countries, the article noted, and went on:
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il clarified the importance of cultural exchange in promoting the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					Under his guidance artistes of the DPRK successfully created the operas "A Dream of Red Mansions" and "Liang Shanbo and Zhu Yingtai".
					
					A new chapter "Arirang of Friendship" was added to the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", deeply impressing and encouraging Chinese spectators.
					
					He, together with us, enjoyed the performance of Chinese dance drama "Confetti on Silk Road".
					
					The ambassador recalled Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the work of the Chinese embassy in Pyongyang.
					
					While touring various places, we witnessed the Korean people striving hard to build a thriving socialist nation, in single-minded unity under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					We experienced that the Sino-DPRK friendship is displaying great vitality, deeply rooted in the minds of the people and we came to be confident of the prospect of the development of the Sino-DPRK friendship and cooperation.
					
					We, at the same time, firmly pledged ourselves to positively contribute to the development of the Sino-DPRK friendship by realizing the noble intention of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					Noting that the Sino-DPRK relations grew stronger last year thanks to the deep concern of General Secretary Hu Jintao and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, he continued:
					
					We are convinced of more beautiful future, full of faith.
					
					The Korean people are successfully putting the far-reaching plan of General Secretary Kim Jong Il into practice.
					
					The Korean people united close around the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Comrade Kim Jong Un are now making vigorous endeavors to implement the behests of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and fling open the gate to a thriving nation.
					
					We heartily wish the DPRK prosperity and its people happiness.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Held in China
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Held in China
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show was held in Shenyang, China, on Feb. 13 to commemorate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. It was sponsored by the General Association of Koreans in China.
					Displayed at its venue were flowers of the sun carrying boundless reverence of all people against background of poem "Shining Star" written by President Kim Il Sung and Jong Il Peak.
					
					Present there were Chairperson Choe Un Bok and officials of the association, delegates of its organizations and Koreans in China, the consul-general and staff members of the DPRK consulate-general in Shenyang, members of DPRK trade missions in Shenyang and personages of different strata of China.
					
					Speeches were made at the show.
					
					The participants expressed burning emotion, looking round flowers in praise of the great man.
					
					Choe Un Bok said that immortal flowers came to full bloom with deep reverence of the world people on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il.
					
					All Koreans in China will devotedly contribute to building a thriving nation in the DPRK and reliably preserve the patriotic tradition under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un, Choe said.
					
					The director of the Foreign Affairs Office of the Liaoning Provincial People's Government of China said that the feats of Kim Jong Il, who made great contribution to strengthening the Sino-DPRK friendship, would be everlasting.
					
					The director of the Center for Korean Peninsula Studies of the Liaoning Provincial Academy of Social Sciences said that Kimjongilia fully mirrors the great personality of Kim Jong Il, a peerlessly elder statesman. "Shining Star" will go down forever with the beauty of Kimjongilia, the director added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Close Friend of Chinese People: Chinese Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Close Friend of Chinese People: Chinese Ambassador
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Liu Hongcai, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, had an interview with journalists of media organs in Pyongyang and foreign correspondents on Thursday after laying a floral basket before the portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il at Kim Il Sung Square to pay homage to him on the Day of the Shining Star.
					Expressing deep reverence for Kim Jong Il, the ambassador said: 
					
					I cannot repress my ardent yearning for him today, the significant Day of the Shining Star.
					
					His benevolent and kind image comes to my mind and his voice is still ringing in my ears.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il is the great leader of the Korean people and a close friend of the Chinese people.
					
					He showed deep care for the development of the Sino-DPRK friendly relations and performed enormous feats in boosting these relations.
					
					It is him who glorified the traditional Sino-DPRK friendship, forged and cultivated by President Kim Il Sung together with elder revolutionaries of China.
					
					It is the common understanding of the two parties and countries and the desire of the two peoples to consolidate and develop this friendship.
					
					In the new century General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited China several times and met and forged warm friendship with party and state leaders of China.
					
					He prompted the development of the China-DPRK friendly relationship and opened up radiant vistas for it.
					
					He received Chinese party, government and military delegations visiting the DPRK and gave receptions for them.
					
					He attached importance to the development of the traditional relations of friendship between the two parties and countries.
					
					The overall exchange and cooperation between the two countries grew stronger under his deep care.
					
					While being active in the DPRK I witnessed the Korean people striving to build a thriving socialist country, rallied as one in mind under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Korean people are now translating his far-reaching plan into a brilliant reality.
					
					I heartily hope that the Korean people would achieve prosperity under the leadership of Comrade Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Moscow on February 13 to commemorate the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Seen on the front wall of its venue were portraits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					On display in its venue were works of the peerlessly great men and photos of Kim Jong Il on historic visits to Russia and his Songun revolutionary leadership feats.
					
					Attending the meeting were personages of the Russian preparatory committee for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK and media persons and masses.
					
					The ambassador and staff members of the DPRK embassy in Moscow were present on invitation.
					
					The participants in the meeting observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Mozgovoi, first secretary of the C.C., Communist Party of the Soviet Union, said:
					
					Kim Jong Il was the great sun of the world socialist movement.
					
					He developed and enriched the Juche idea, the Songun idea and led socialism in the DPRK to victory by carrying forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					Today organizations for the study of the Juche idea, the Songun idea are active in different parts of Russia.
					
					The revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il will last forever.
					
					Chairman Petrov of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK said:
					
					I never imagined we would greet the 70th birthday of Kim Jong Il without him.
					
					He dedicated his revolutionary life to justice and people's happiness by carrying forward Kim Il Sung's cause.
					
					Now his cause is being carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The Korean people's true and friendly friends in Russia will always remember Kim Jong Il's feats.
					
					Vorontsov, first vice-chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, said:
					
					Kim Jong Il was a great man who rendered great services for the socialist cause and the history of world politics.
					
					He authored "Socialism Is a Science" at the end of the last century and other famous works and led the Korean people to victory with his optimism and staunch spirit "Let's advance merrily, though our way is rugged " during the Arduous March.
					
					When the world imperialists worked hard to stifle the DPRK by force of arms, he pursued Songun politics, turning it into a nuclear weapons state.
					
					The DPRK overpowered foreign forces with its nuclear deterrent and a high level of diplomatic skill.
					
					This was the result of Kim Jong Il's wise leadership.
					
					It is also thanks to his historic services that the Russia-DPRK relations have reached such new high stage of development as we see today.
					
					It is my belief that the Korean people would achieve shining successes in the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Seminars Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
articles.content:
Seminars Commemorate Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Seminars commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il were held in Nepal, India, Nigeria and Guinea between February 1 and 7.
					Displayed in the venues were books and of the glorious revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Nepali minister of State for Information and Communications praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as the leaders of the people peerless in history as they devoted their whole lives to the prosperity of the country, happiness of its people and human cause of independence.
					
					The chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il said Kim Jong Il set forth the Songun political mode as required by the present times and resolutely smashed the moves of the imperialist allied forces to stifle the DPRK, bringing hope to the progressive people.
					
					The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Songun Politics noted that peace and security have been fully ensured on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia as Kim Jong Il, possessed of brilliant wisdom and strategy and tactics and outstanding commanding art, wisely led the Songun revolution 
					
					The chairman of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at the Kankan University in Guinea said that Kim Jong Il is deeply respected by the international community, adding that the future of progressive humankind is in safe hands as his cause is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in India.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in India
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Observed in India
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A national seminar of India for commemorating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il took place in New Delhi on February 11.
					On display in its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos of their immortal exploits.
					
					The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, G. Debarajan, secretary of the Central Committee of the All-India Forward Bloc, and other speakers praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding thinker and theoretician, great statesman, peerless brilliant commander of Songun and benevolent father of the people who performed undying feats for the sacred cause for the country and its people.
					
					They recalled that Kim Jong Il gave perfect answers to all issues arising in the revolution and construction through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and his original Songun politics and thus protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the peace and security of the world.
					
					H.E. Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people, is identical to H.E. Kim Jong Il, they said, adding: 
					
					Under his leadership the Korean people will certainly build a thriving nation and accomplish national reunification, the desires and ideals of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Printed in Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Hekadaha Printing and Publishing House of Indonesia on February 10.
					The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun-based revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is an effective political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on attaching importance to arms and a scientific revolutionary line and a political mode that most correctly reflected the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Commemorated in Venezuela
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for commemorating the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Venezuela on February 9.
					Diego Antonio Rivero, chairman of the Venezuela-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The preparatory committee decided to organize colorful events including a remembrance meeting and seminar from February 9 to March 26.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Parties and Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Parties and Organizations
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Political parties and organizations of different countries on Feb. 6 and 7 posted on their Internet homepages special write-ups on the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The Socialist Party of Romania posted on its homepage an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be alive" illustrated with a photo of him standing together with the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The article referred to the undying feats performed by Kim Jong Il. It went on: Leader Kim Jong Il was a tender-hearted father of the people.
					
					He conducted energetic activities, devoting his all to the people's happiness without a moment's rest despite scorching heat and biting cold. He passed away of a sudden illness caused by pent-up mental and physical strain on a train. 
					
					He will always be alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted on their joint homepage an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il is the tender-hearted father of the Korean people" illustrated with his portrait.
					
					The article said: Today when the birth anniversary of the great Comrade Kim Jong Il who led the Korean revolution to victory in the 21st century is commemorated, we can hardly repress bitter grief over his loss.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK will accomplish his cause generation after generation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					We pay highest tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					The Communist Party of Argentina posted on its Internet homepage an article on his undying ideo-theoretical feats and warm love for the people.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian and Syrian Personages
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Jong Il Praised by Italian and Syrian Personages
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- Italian and Syrian personages issued statements on Feb. 8 and 9 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The organizational secretary of the Struggle for the Peace and Socialism of Italy in a statement titled "The undying feats performed by Supreme Leader Kim Jong Il will shine forever" said:
					
					HE Kim Jong Il formulated the revolutionary idea of the great President Kim Il Sung as an integral system of ideas and theories and methods of Juche and pursued the policy of giving priority to ideology, turning the DPRK into a politico-ideological power and a military power.
					
					Though HE Kim Jong Il passed away, the feats he performed on behalf of the Korean revolution, the era and history will shine long.
					
					Saber Ballul, department head of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus, noted in a statement titled "On the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il":
					
					HE Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					He developed the Workers' Party of Korea into a competent revolutionary party and turned the Korean People's Army into an invincible revolutionary army.

articles.title: Asian Regional Seminar Held in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Asian Regional Seminar Held in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- An Asian regional seminar for the study of the Juche idea on the sovereignty and world peace was held in Bangladesh on February 8 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					Displayed in its venue were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and books and photos of their undying feats.
					
					The participants paid a silent tribute to Kim Jong Il.
					
					After a keynote report was made by Vishwanath, director general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, the floor was taken by Harish Gupta, director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea, Ghazi Zafar Ahmed, former prime minister of Bangladesh, Rashed Khan Menon, chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, Khaleq Zaman Bhuiyan, general secretary of the C. C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, representatives of Juche idea study organizations in Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Japan, Bangladesh, etc. and followers of the Juche idea.
					
					The reporter and speakers lauded Kim Jong Il as a peerless great man and a political elder of the world who led the human cause of independence to victory with matchless idea and leadership art.
					
					As Kim Jong Il developed and enriched the Juche idea, the progressive people aspiring after independence came to have a powerful weapon for the struggle to build a new world free from any exploitation and oppression, aggression and war, they said.
					
					He honorably safeguarded the gains of socialism by pursuing Songun politics and made a great contribution to the world peace and security and the human cause of independence, they added.
					
					They recalled that Kim Jong Il led all Koreans along the road of independence and great national unity, ushering in the June 15 era of reunification, and made an undying contribution to the victory of socialism and the accomplishment of the just cause of friendship and solidarity among the peoples.
					
					They reiterated their will to invigorate their activities for disseminating the Juche idea, the Songun idea, and boosting support and solidarity with the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving nation and to reunify the country.
					
					A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported at Meeting of Int'l Organization
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported at Meeting of Int'l Organization
Pyongyang, February 16 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the Executive Committee of the Women's International Democratic Federation held in Portugal from Feb. 3 to 7 expressed support and solidarity for the just cause of the Korean people.
					The meeting decided on the issue of commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il as a grand political festival common to mankind.
					
					It also adopted a statement supporting the Korean people and women in their struggle to ensure peace on the Korean Peninsula and achieve the independent reunification of the country.
					
					Accusing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet group of planning to stage joint military exercises for invading the DPRK from the outset of the new year, the statement branded them as acts of escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula and laying an obstacle to the Korean people's cause of national reunification.
					
					Urging the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and stop the moves for beefing up armed forces and the military exercises for aggression against the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					For the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea the U.S. should withdraw its forces for aggression from south Korea and accept the DPRK's proposal for replacing the armistice agreement with a peace agreement.
					
					We fully support the Korean people and women in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country and ensure peace and security on the Korean Peninsula under the banner of Songun and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country according to the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					We will boost cooperation and solidarity with the women and other people of the DPRK in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country against imperialism on the forefront of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un rinde homenaje a Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz (16 de febrero, dia de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il), el Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo, Kim Jong Un, visito el dia 16 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan y rindio sublime homenaje al Dirigente.
					Le acompanaron Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk, Kim Chang Sop y otros funcionarios del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del PTC y el Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los miembros de mando de operaciones de la Comandancia Suprema del EPC, los comandantes de las grandes unidades combinadas del EPC, los secretarios responsables del Comite del PTC en las provincias y los funcionarios directivos de ministerios y organos centrales.
					
					El jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC y la Guardia Roja Obrero-Campesina dio el parte de recepcion al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il ante su retrato con amplia sonrisa.
					
					Ante su retrato estaba colocado un cesto de flores en nombre comun del CC y la CMC, del PTC, el CDN de la RPDC, el Presidum de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC y el Consejo de Ministros de la RPDC.
					
					En la cinta del cesto de flores se leen: "El gran Dirigente, camarada Kim Jong Il, sera inmortal".
					
					Kim Jong Un rindio sublime homenaje al Dirigente ante su retrato con amplia sonrisa junto con los funcionarios directivos de los organismos del Partido, el Estado y las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Tiene lugar la denominacion del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Tiene lugar la denominacion del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 16 en el Palacio Memorial Kumsusan, Lugar Sagrado del Juche, la ceremonia para anunciar la resolucion conjunta sobre la denominacion del mismo como Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, rendir sublime homenaje al Generalisimo Kim Il Sung y al Generalisimo Kim Jong Il y jurar la fidelidad al Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea Kim Jong Un. 
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un asistio a la ceremonia. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el ejercito: Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho, Kim Kyong Hui, Kim Yong Chun y Kim Jong Gak, los comandantes de ejercitos y armas, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los benemeritos y los innovadores laborales.
					
					Fueron invitados los compatriotas en ultramar, que vinieron en delegaciones o individualmente para conmemorar el Dia de la Estrella Luz, el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang, los representantes diplomaticos de varios paises, delegados de las organizaciones internacionales y los integrantes del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares acreditados en Corea. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio rindiendo los mas sentidos tributos a la memoria del Dirigente.
					
					Se publico la resolucion conjunta del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, sobre la denominacion del Palacio Memorial Kumsusan, donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente y el Dirigente, como Palacio del Sol Kumsusan. 
					
					Luego, tuvo lugar la ceremonia de los oficiales y soldados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Todos los participantes en el acto rindieron el mas sublime homenaje hacia los retratos de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa, fundador y constructor de las Fuerzas Armadas Revolucionarias de Corea. 
					
					Se tiraron 21 salvas mientras se interpretaban con solemnidad la "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y la "Cancion del General Kim Jong Il". 
					
					Hizo uso de la palabra Ri Yong Ho, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					El orador juro solemnemente recogiendo la ferrea conviccion y voluntad del EPC, ejercito del Presidente, el Dirigente y del Comandante Supremo, de compartir siempre el destino con el partido en cualesquier circunstancias. 
					
					Acto seguido, entro en la plaza el retrato de     Kim Jong Il con amplia sonrisa escoltado por la columna de estandartes.  
					
					Las columnas de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas del EPC marcharon al compas de las musicas de instrumentos de viento enarbolando las banderas del Comandante Supremo del EPC y del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y los estandartes militares. 
					
					Kim Jong Un respondio a las columnas que pasaban a pasos firmes por delante de la tribuna. 
					
					Desfilaron despues los bloques de lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados, misiles y carros blindados. 
					
					Terminado el desfile militar, Kim Jong Un respondio cordialmente con la mano alzada a las efusivas aclamaciones de la multitud.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Medvedev
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Medvedev
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 16 el Presidente de Rusia, D. Medvedev, con motivo del 70o aniversario del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					Su texto sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 70o aniversario del natalicio de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, fiesta nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hago llegarle a Vd. mis felicitaciones. 
					
					En Rusia no se olvidan y aprecian mucho los esfuerzos de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il por el desarrollo de las relaciones de buena vecindad entre los dos paises. 
					
					Estoy seguro de que la cooperacion Rusia-Corea, basada en la larga tradicion de amistad y respeto mutuo, seguira desarrollandose en lo adelante tambien conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises y contribuira a preservar la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region asiatica. 
					
					Le deseo a Vd. exitos en sus actividades estatales y al pueblo coreano, la felicidad, la paz y la prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente de Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de presidente de Myanmar
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio el mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 10 el presidente de la Union de Myanmar, Thein Sein con motivo del septuagesimo aniversario de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del jubiloso dia de nacimiento de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hago llegarle, en nombre del pueblo de la Union de Myanmar y en el mio propio, la sincera felicitacion a Su Excelencia, y por su conducto, al pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para desearle de todo corazon la buena salud y los exitos en su labor para el incesante progreso y la prosperidad de la RPDC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del presidente de Uganda
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 9 el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente         Kim Jong Il. 
					La misiva senala: 
					
					Con motivo de este gran dia, expreso la satisfaccion por las excelentes relaciones y la cooperacion existentes entre nuestros dos paises y reafirmo a Vd. mi decision de estrechar la cooperacion con Vd. para desarrollar estas buenas relaciones conforme a los intereses de nuestros dos paises. 
					
					Le hago llegar a Su Excelencia una vez mas mis calurosas felicitaciones. 
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta del CC del FDNA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta del CC del FDNA
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que con motivo del dia de nacimiento del Dirigente         Kim Jong Il, le enviara el dia 16 el Comite Central del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista. 
					La misiva senala que la vida revolucionaria de cerca de 70 anos del Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue la mas brillante del patriota sin igual y gran hombre legendario quien registro victorias y glorias en el largo trayecto de la revolucion del Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					El Dirigente formulo los Tres Principios de la Reunificacion de la Patria, el  Programa de Diez Puntos de la Gran Unidad Pannacional y el Proyecto de Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo, presentados por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, como Tres Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria y aprobo con su decision audaz y patriotica la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre infundiendo en toda la nacion coreana el animo y la conviccion en la reunificacion de la patria, afirma la nota. 
					
					El Dirigente goza de absoluto respeto y veneracion de todo el mundo como defensor de la justicia y veterano de la politica internacional, quien estimulo energicamente a la humanidad progresista aspirante a la independencia y el socialismo y dio despiadado golpe a la estrategia de hegemonia mundial de los imperialistas, destaca. 
					
					Prosigue que la causa de toda la vida del Dirigente Kim Jong Il se lleva adelante por el Maximo Dirigente  Kim Jong Un,  gran hombre sin igual. 
					
					Gracias al Maximo Dirigente, sera eterno el Dirigente Kim Jong Il como Sol del Songun y saldran sin falta victoriosas la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la gran empresa de construccion de la potencia prospera reunificada, conducidas por el Dirigente, concluye.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de entidad china
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores de entidad china

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta del Presidium del CC de Chongryon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta del Presidium del CC de Chongryon
Pyongyang, 16 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le enviara el dia 16 el Presidium del Comite Central de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) con motivo del dia de natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					La misiva alaba al Dirigente como politico mas destacado en la historia de la humanidad, quien durante varios decenios desde cuando emprendio temprano el camino de revolucion abrio la nueva coyuntura de la revolucion con su clarividente inteligencia, la ideologia y teoria enciclopedicas, la extraordinaria capacidad directiva y las nobles virtudes y acumulo inmortales hazanas ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la historia. 
					
					El Dirigente fue salvador de la reunificacion de la patria quien abrio el ancho camino de reunificacion con la aprobacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programas de reunificacion comunes de la nacion en el nuevo siglo, y destacado veterano politico, quien defendio la paz mundial y condujo a la victoria la causa de la independencia de la humanidad dirigiendo la corriente de la politica internacional del siglo XXI, afirma la nota. 
					
					Prosigue que el General Kim Jong Il fue gran Dirigente del movimiento de coreanos residentes en Japon y generoso padre de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y de los compatriotas en Japon. 
					
					Contar con el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un es la gran fortuna de la patria, la nacion y la Chongryon, senala y expresa la voluntad de desarrollar las organizaciones de la Chongryon como entes ultramarinas infinitamente fieles a el. 
					
					Por ultimo, expone la decision de celebrar el centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung como maxima fiesta comun de la nacion corana y de toda la humanidad para demostrar al interior y exterior del pais la fidelidad patriotica de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y de los coreanos residentes en Japon que continuan sin vacilacion alguna el linaje de Mangyongdae y las tradicones del Paektu.
